articles.author: David Ovalle, Maxine Wallace
articles.title: Dangerous or life-saving? Why drug programs that stop disease are under fire. - The Washington Post
articles.description: A decade after a historic HIV outbreak in Indiana, syringe programs that helped contain the crisis are at risk of disappearing due to federal funding restrictions and local opposition.
articles.content: EVANSVILLE, Ind. Lavender Timmons popped the trunk of her weather-beaten 2007 Ford Focus parked near the citys homeless shelter. Regulars gathered around, including one drug user who in the past boug… [+12031 chars]
